definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Forecasting the market-clearing price (MCP) is the most essential task for any decision-making in electricity market.
sentences.chinese: 市场清算电价预测是电力市场中交易决策的基础。

sentences.english: The future detailed prices were forecasted by univariate time series models.
sentences.chinese: 用单变量时间序列模型预测未来细节电价。

sentences.english: The electricity price shall be based on the principle of uniform policy, unified pricing and be regulated at different levels.
sentences.chinese: 电价实行统一政策，统一定价原则，分级管理。

sentences.english: On-grid electricity prices shall be published.
Most businesses will be more willing to accept higher prices than power cuts.
sentences.chinese: 比起拉闸限电，很多企业更愿意接受更高电价。

sentences.english: Volatility is the measure of change in the price of electricity over a given period of time.
sentences.chinese: 仄稳率是衡终婺窜改正在电价正在给定的韶光周期内。

sentences.english: At that price for electricity, driving a mile costs about 2 cents.
sentences.chinese: 以这个电价来算的话，行驶一英里需要花费2美分。

sentences.english: On this basis, a system dynamic model of peak and valley time price is established.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，建立了峰谷分时电价系统动力学模型。

sentences.english: Quantitively analyses the effect of the ratio of peak to off-peak electricity rates on the operating cost.
sentences.chinese: 定量分析了谷峰电价比对系统运行电费的影响。

sentences.english: We will tighten oversight of electricity rates charged by power plants with desulfurizing devices and improve the system for demand-side management of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 继续加强脱硫电价监管，完善需求侧电价管理制度。

sentences.english: We will tighten oversight of electricity rates charged by power plants with desulfurizing devices and improve the system for demand-side management of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 继续加强脱硫电价监管，完善需求侧电价管理制度。

sentences.english: Article 41 The State adopts a categorized electricity price and time-of-use electricity price.
sentences.chinese: 第四十一条国家实行分类电价和分时电价。

sentences.english: Article 41 The State adopts a categorized electricity price and time-of-use electricity price.
sentences.chinese: 第四十一条国家实行分类电价和分时电价。

sentences.english: In some of American Electricity Markets, such as PJM, the clearing price is determined by Locational Marginal Pricing.
sentences.chinese: 美国PJM等电力市场均采用节点电价的计算方法。

sentences.english: The charge of power that party B pays party A according to the national standard every month is settled to his actual usage.
sentences.chinese: 乙方使用的电费按国家电价规定每月按实支付给甲方。

sentences.english: Pass finally calculate exemple test and verify this method is right the effectiveness that achieves electrovalency linkage.
sentences.chinese: 最后通过算例验证了该方法对实现电价联动的有效性。
